website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, versatile, stylish, and comfortable. The New Balance footwear company hits the mark with the Suede 247, another great new iteration of the 247 series. The competitively-priced low-top sneaker has an understated profile but contains impressive elements, which also include a breathable build. The shoe has a suede material that is hard to clean, but other than this, reviews mostly favor this footwear. It also helps that the shoe’s price is competitive.
pros: ‘Comfortable’ is the word many reviewers first use when describing the New Balance Suede 247
Several have stated that they like the shoe’s soft material and that the shoe is the most comfortable they’ve had in a long time
A good number of testers are happy with the lightweight feel of the sneaker
Several users call the shoe versatile because it can be worn with almost anything
The New Balance Suede 247 is a stylish shoe according to some buyers
The casual low-top is a breathable shoe that keeps the feet cool, a few purchasers have remarked
One customer loves the colorways of the Suede 247 which he calls ‘great.’
A buyer likes the low-top footwear’s price, which he says is far less expensive than other comfort-driven shoes from other brands
cons: One buyer of the New Balance Suede 247 says the fabric of the shoe is hard to clean
A purchaser is dismayed with the adhesive residue on some parts of the sneaker

customer_reviews.title: Great for knee pain for active people!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of my pervasive knee pain. I’m 38, but have put a lot of wear and tear on my body for years. I simply wanted a shoe that would help me be active and not in constant pain. These shoes have been superb. Comfortable. I can train and not feel so damaged. Wish I had bought them years ago.
customer_reviews.author: CURTIS ANTHONY FRANZ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a good versatile color.
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected and are comfortable, although not as well made as e.g. the 990 V4.
customer_reviews.author: Coolmaker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little long in the toe but extremely comfortable shoe and very sharp looking
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Kyes

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are exactly what I expected extremely comfortable and supportive for workouts and running
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are exactly what I expected extremely comfortable and supportive for workouts and running. I ordered grey and got blue so I'm pretty dissapointss in that but will still wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows orange but they are very very neon orange. Extremely comfortable and feels great running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes. Easily, my most comfortable sneakers and so stylish! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the tip of the foot but other than that great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Little snug around the tip of the foot but other than that great shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Willis

customer_reviews.title: Swaggy Kickz
customer_reviews.text: It feels and looks great for casual or walking use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New balance is the best shoe. I will never buy any other brand ...
customer_reviews.text: New balance is the best shoe. I will never buy any other brand for these style shoes. I usually get the 900 series but I needed something for Work that looked less sporty. These are great shoes and the material is very nice. Best part, they listened to the customer and made the heal so you can slip in with laces already tied if in a rush. No more breaking the heal part of shoe 😂
customer_reviews.author: Rut

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: look great, not easy to put on because of fixed tongue making it style over substance.
customer_reviews.author: vaeho

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: ANKLE OPENING ISTOO SMALL NOT LIKE THE NORMAL nEW bALANCE
customer_reviews.author: Howard L. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good pair off shoes but I’ve been in a 11
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good pair off shoes but I’ve been in a 11.5 shoe since I was 11 there a half size to big
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but runs big. Order a 1/2 size smaller than your normal size. I have been a 9.5 my whole life in Every shoe. I wear a 9 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 247v1 Sneaker, Grey, 9 UK
product_meta.description: The 247 upgrades to premium status in tonal leather and suedes. The REVlite midsole is designed to provide superior fit and luxury comfort.
